notes.text:
This update for python-Twisted fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2016-1000111: sets environmental variable HTTP_PROXY based on user
  supplied Proxy request header (bsc#989997)
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: Twisted before 16.3.1 does not attempt to address RFC 3875 section 4.1.18 namespace conflicts and therefore does not protect CGI applications from the presence of untrusted client data in the HTTP_PROXY environment variable, which might allow remote attackers to redirect a CGI application's outbound HTTP traffic to an arbitrary proxy server via a crafted Proxy header in an HTTP request, aka an "httpoxy" issue.
notes.title: CVE description

remediations.details: To install this SUSE Security Update use the SUSE recommended installation methods like YaST online_update or "zypper patch".
